string.name: formatted_phone
string.value: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'].replace(/[^0-9]/g, '').length === 10 ? '+1' + $node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'].replace(/[^0-9]/g, '') : ($node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'].startsWith('+') ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'].replace(/[^+0-9]/g, '') : '+1' + $node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'].replace(/[^0-9]/g, ''))}}

additionalFields.companyName: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['company'] !== 'Company not provided' ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['company'] : ''}}
additionalFields.firstName: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'] && $node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'] !== 'Name not provided' ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'].trim().split(' ')[0] : 'Unknown'}}
additionalFields.industry: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['industry'] !== 'Industry not provided' ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['industry'] : ''}}
additionalFields.lastName: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'] && $node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'] !== 'Name not provided' && $node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'].trim().split(' ').length > 1 ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['name'].trim().split(' ').slice(1).join(' ') : 'Unknown'}}
additionalFields.message: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['message'] !== 'No message provided' ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['message'] : ''}}
additionalFields.phoneNumber: ={{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'] !== 'Phone not provided' ? $node['Extract Form Data'].json['phone'] : ''}}

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Thank you for your demo request! We'll call you shortly.",
  "call_initiated": true,
  "vapi_call_id": "{{$node['Make VAPI Call'].json['id']}}",
  "hubspot_contact_id": "{{$node['Create HubSpot Contact'].json['id']}}",
  "estimated_call_time": "Within 5 minutes",
  "submission_id": "{{$node['Extract Form Data'].json['submission_time']}}"
}
